sentences.en: A copy of the notice of appeal is enclosed for the Respondent.

sentences.en: Article 13 The provisions of Articles 5 and 12 are applicable to cases where the respondent raises a counter - claim.
sentences.cn: 第十三条本办法第五条、十二条的规定同样适用于被申请人提出 反 请求的情形.

sentences.en: Article 7 The complainant and respondent shall bear the burden of proof for their own claims.
sentences.cn: 第七条投诉人和被投诉人应当对各自的主张承担举证责任.

In addition, the respondent disclosed professional confidences to one of the patients.
sentences.cn: 另外，被告还向其中一位病人透露了行业机密。

sentences.en: In the survey the scale was not presented directly to the respondent.
sentences.cn: 在这一调查中并未将标度直接提给回答者.

sentences.en: Only 62 percent of respondents said they were satisfied.
sentences.cn: 回复调查的人中只有62%表示满意。

sentences.en: The expenses for arbitration shall be borne by the claimant ( respondent ).
sentences.cn: 仲裁费用将由原告 ( 被告 ) 负担.

sentences.en: The knee jerk is a typical respondent.
sentences.cn: 膝反射是一种典型反射.

sentences.en: The police must first order the respondent to stop the nuisance.
sentences.cn: 警察必须首先命令被告停止伤害行为.

sentences.en: Upon receipt of a copy of the arbitration application, the respondent shall, within the time limit prescribed by the Arbitration Rules, submit its defence to the arbitration commission.
sentences.cn: 被申请人收到仲裁申请书副本后，应当在仲裁规则规定的期限内向仲裁委员会提交答辩书。
